thread.section_title: Minideal Net Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Minideal Net | www.minideal.net
thread.title: Vassilis

author: Vassilis
title: Vassilis
text: I am from GREECE. I bought from that site a phone MEIZU MX4 PRO which had problem with graphics which means the gpu had problem. I communicate with them with e mail,after their request i sent videos to show that problem. They told to sent it back to CHINA to fix the problem as i did. Then they sent back to me but the problem in gpu remained. They told to sent it back for second time and that happened and 3RD TIME!!! They didnt do nothing, they didnt fix the problem and they didnt sent me new phone because it was obviously that the phone is crearly malfunction. Their behavior was unprofessional. Dont buy anything from them! They are amateurs!!!
